name: Observed (Aphia)
description:
Observed is based in the portuguese traditional childhood game "1, 2, 3 Macaquinho do Chinês", also known as the Statue game.

The player is stuck in a room with a monster and needs to get to the key so they can open the door and escape. In order to avoid being detected by the monster, the player needs to freeze which only happens if they can type the displayed sequence in time. The player moves forward automatically (no action needed).

Observed was done for the 2020 edition of the Houdini Game Jam under the theme "Don't Panic!".

We are part of our college game development group, GameDev Tecnico, which can be found here on Itch.io, and on Facebook and Twitter!
